author: Universal Pictures
description:
Lamont Cranston taps into his dark powers, shifting into The Shadow to confront evil with mystery and force.

In this thrilling adventure, Lamont Cranston—once a man lost in darkness—embraces his destiny as The Shadow. With mind-bending powers and a mission to fight crime, he becomes the unseen protector against forces that threaten the city.

Directed By: Russell Mulcahy
